title: Panic in Echo Park (Drama, 1977) Dorian Harewood, Robin Gammell | Full Movie

sources.title: Panic in Echo Park (Drama, 1977) Dorian Harewood, Robin Gammell | Full Movie
sources.description:
A young black M.D. tries to prove that the community of Echo Park is endangered by a deadly epidemic. But he has to fight his superior in the hospital and city government who accuse him of just causing panic.

Original title: Panic in Echo Park (1977) 

Director: John Llewellyn Moxey
Writer: Dalene Young
Stars: Dorian Harewood, Robin Gammell, Catlin Adams 
Genres: Medical Drama, Made for TV


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:51 Drama unfolds in a hospital setting as Dr. Stoner deals with various challenges and conflicts.
06:57 A conversation between Cynthia and Shane's friend leads to plans for a lunch meeting with parents.
13:03 Medical drama unfolds as a director faces challenges in a hospital setting with mysterious symptoms and urgent tests.
19:52 Chaos ensues as a doctor investigates a potential health threat linked to a local market.
25:52 Meeting between doctors and friends leads to discussions about healthcare and personal relationships.
30:19 Drama unfolds as characters navigate through personal and professional challenges in Echo Park.
33:58 Drama unfolds as a doctor investigates mysterious illness outbreak in a community clinic.
39:21 Investigation into contaminated water supply leads to tension and conflict at a hospital.
45:15 Investigation into suspicious construction activities at Seventh and Melrose building.
50:54 A drama unfolds as a doctor investigates a suspicious case involving a company owner and environmental pollution.
56:07 Intense drama unfolds as Michael seeks evidence against Lamberti with Cynthia's help.
1:04:09 Investigation into a potential disaster involving chemicals and construction projects in the town.
1:09:03 TV show featuring a doctor named Stoner, who is praised for his bravery in uncovering the truth behind corruption in Lovato Palms.
